title: Inception
summary: A skilled thief is offered a chance to erase his past by planting an idea into a target's subconscious.

summary: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control to his reluctant son.

summary: A jazz musician and an aspiring actress fall in love in Los Angeles.

summary: The life journey of a simple man with a low IQ who influences major historical events.
